directions: In a large saucepan combine butter, sugar, milk, dates, raisins, currants, mixed fruit peel and zest of the orange; bring to a boil.  Remove from heat and stir in baking soda.  Sift in the flour, cinnamon and salt; mix gently until blended.  Pour into prepared pudding mold.
Cover with a double layer of greased wax paper and steam for 2 hours.
ingredients: 1/4 cup candied mixed fruit peel, chopped
title: Plum Pudding II
